程序包 src.main.java.Login_story1_3

类 RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Login_story1_3.RegistrationController
public class RegistrationController extends Object
Title : RegistrationController.java Description: Controller for the registration view. It handles user registration, validates fields, encrypts passwords, and saves user information to a CSV file.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RegistrationController

      public RegistrationController()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the registration form. Sets the date picker to disable future dates.

    • handleRegister

      private void handleRegister()
      Handles the register button click event. Validates the form fields, encrypts the password, generates a new user ID, creates a user object, saves the user to the CSV file, and shows a success or error alert. If registration is successful, it switches to the login screen.

    • encryptPassword

      public String encryptPassword(String password) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Encrypts the given password using the SHA-256 algorithm and Base64 encoding.
      参数:
      password - The plaintext password to be encrypted.
      返回:
      The Base64-encoded SHA-256 hash of the password.
      抛出:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the SHA-256 algorithm is not available.

    • handleBack

      private void handleBack()
      Handles the back button click event. Switches to the login screen.

    • validateFields

      private boolean validateFields()
      Validates the form fields. Checks if all required fields are filled and if the email format is valid. Shows an error alert if validation fails.
      返回:
      true if all fields are valid; false otherwise.

    • isValidEmail

      public boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Checks if the given email address is in a valid format.
      参数:
      email - The email address to be checked.
      返回:
      true if the email is valid; false otherwise.

    • saveUser

      private void saveUser(User user)
      Saves the user information to the CSV file. Converts the user object to a CSV line and appends it to the file.
      参数:
      user - The user object to be saved.

    • switchToLoginScreen

      private void switchToLoginScreen()
      Switches to the login screen. Closes the current registration window and opens the login window.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Displays an alert with the given title and message. Calls the overloaded showAlert method with a null post-action.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message of the alert.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message, Runnable postAction)
      Displays an alert with the given title, message, and an optional post-action. Runs on the JavaFX application thread.
      参数:
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message of the alert.
      postAction - An optional callback function to be executed after the alert is closed.

    • getNextUserId

      public String getNextUserId()
      Gets the next user ID. Reads the last line of the user.csv file, extracts the last user ID, and increments it by 1. If the file is empty or an error occurs, returns "1".
      返回:
      The next user ID as a string.
